definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The technological chain of producing heat-resistant porcelain with the local ban-cite was narrated in particular.
sentences.chinese: 主要叙述采用本地红墙石试制耐热瓷的工艺过程。

sentences.english: Burn candles on a flat, stable, heat-resistant surface.
sentences.chinese: 将蜡烛放在平稳及耐热的平面上燃点。

sentences.english: Unlike enzymes cofactors are, in general, stable to heat.
sentences.chinese: 和酶不同，辅助因子往往是耐热的。

sentences.english: Yucca Do Nursery, inc. specializes in Drought and Heat Tolerant Plants and Trees.
sentences.chinese: 斯兰度那丝瑞公司专供耐旱和耐热的植物和树木。

sentences.english: Inorganic filler, such as quartz powder, was filled.
sentences.chinese: 填加无机耐热填料石英粉。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare the stabilizer of freeze-dried recombinant MVA virus vector vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研制重组MVA病毒载体疫苗的耐热冻干保护剂。

sentences.english: Refractory steel often occurs pulverization and peeling phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 耐热钢在还原性气氛下工作时，常发生粉化剥落现象。

sentences.english: The improvement factors for creep fracture strength were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了稀土元素改善耐热钢热强性的因素。

sentences.english: Finally, the author proposed the direction and task for further development of such kind of steels.
sentences.chinese: 作者提出了今后研制耐热钢的方向和任务。

sentences.english: Silicone heat-resistant coating in the development and production have been years of history.
sentences.chinese: 从事有机硅耐热涂料的研发和生产已经有多年的历史。

sentences.english: Preparation and identification of the thermostable DNA polymerase expressed in E.
sentences.chinese: 耐热DNA聚合酶在大肠杆菌中得到表达。

sentences.english: Made entirely with heat-resistant glass, the whole brewing process can be seen through.
sentences.chinese: 所有采用耐热玻璃材质，全程观赏汤色和茶叶的变化。

sentences.english: This paper inquires into the possibility of new melting technique for the heat-resisting cast iron with aluminium.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了含铝耐热铸铁熔制新工艺的可行性。

sentences.english: But, decreased degrees of heat -tolerant varieties are lower than that of heat -sensitive varieties.
sentences.chinese: 高温下耐热品种的花粉萌发力大于不耐热品种。

sentences.english: But, decreased degrees of heat -tolerant varieties are lower than that of heat -sensitive varieties.
sentences.chinese: 高温下耐热品种的花粉萌发力大于不耐热品种。
